text.autoconfig.baddiebgon.title: Baddie-B-Gon™
text.autoconfig.baddiebgon.option.banHos: e.g. to ban all spiders, use
text.autoconfig.baddiebgon.option.additi: Mobs specified here (by entity ID) will
also be repelled by Baddie-B-Gon™ items
item.baddiebgon.spray.tooltip: Repels baddies when in your inventory, guaranteed or your money back!
